short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension detects video playback errors and auto refreshes the player.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension works by polling the screen for the exact error button every second. If so, it will emit an HTML click event to simulate user click, automatically reloading the player for the user, improving watch experience.
